  2. “Some of the biggest and most powerful companies are, without permission, using our work to train AI models...This assault on human creativity must be stopped”: Pearl Jam, The Cure, R.E.M. attack “predatory” use of AI in music  Louder
  3. “This Assault on Human Creativity Must Be Stopped”: Jon Bon Jovi, Pearl Jam, and Others Take a Stand Against AI  American Songwriter
  4. Jon Bon Jovi, Billie Eilish and more sign open letter protesting 'predatory use of AI'  ABC News
  5. Billie Eilish, Pearl Jam, 200 artists say AI poses existential threat to their livelihoods  Ars Technica

item.title: A 5′ UTR language model for decoding untranslated regions of mRNA and function predictions - Nature.com
item.description:
1. A 5′ UTR language model for decoding untranslated regions of mRNA and function predictions  Nature.com
  2. Can language models read the genome? This one decoded mRNA to make better vaccines  Phys.org
  3. Podcast: Genomic AI millions of years in the making  Illumina
  4. A Mathematician Uses AI to Find Meaning in Genomic Data  Columbia University's Mailman School of Public Health
  5. AI Breakthrough: Deciphering Genomics for Biological Insights  yTech

item.title: Nvidia plans to build a $200 million AI center in Indonesia amid push into Southeast Asia - CNBC
item.description:
1. Nvidia plans to build a $200 million AI center in Indonesia amid push into Southeast Asia  CNBC
  2. Nvidia plans $200 million AI center in Indonesia  Quartz
  3. Nvidia, Indosat plan $200 mln AI centre investment in Indonesia, government says  Reuters
  4. NVIDIA (NVDA) and Indosat Collaborate to Build AI Center  Yahoo Finance
  5. Nvidia eyes Indonesia for $200M AI center amid global AI scramble  Cointelegraph
